input: {"contract_version":"1.0","topic":"cell_biology","questions":[{"prompt":"What is the powerhouse of the cell?","choices":["Mitochondria","Nucleus","Ribosome","Golgi"],"correct_choice_index":0,"rationale":"Mitochondria produce ATP."},{"prompt":"Where is genetic material stored?","choices":["Cytoplasm","Nucleus","Membrane","Ribosome"],"correct_choice_index":1,"rationale":"The nucleus stores DNA."},{"prompt":"What makes proteins?","choices":["Mitochondria","Nucleus","Ribosome","Golgi"],"correct_choice_index":2,"rationale":"Ribosomes synthesize proteins."},{"prompt":"What modifies proteins?","choices":["Mitochondria","Nucleus","Ribosome","Golgi apparatus"],"correct_choice_index":3,"rationale":"The Golgi modifies proteins."},{"prompt":"What is the cell wall made of?","choices":["Cellulose","Protein","Lipid","Sugar"],"correct_choice_index":0,"rationale":"Plant cell walls contain cellulose."}]}
